oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Two-particle correlations and B-0(B)over-bar(0) mixing
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DASS, GV
SARMA, KVL
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: system
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study the EPR correlation implied by the entangled wavefunction of the B-0(B) over bar(0) pair created by the Upsilon(4S) resonance. The analysis uses the basis provided by the mass eigenstates B-1, B-2 rather than the flavour states B-0, (B) over bar(0). Data on the inclusive dilepton charge ratio are close to the expectation of quantum mechanics, but nearly 8 standard deviations away from that of complete decoherence. Our results are compared with those obtained in the (B-0, (B) over bar(0)) basis.
